predicate.note: Frames file for 'seethe' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to be in a state of turmoil

example.name: with Arg1
example.text: Josh makes clumsy passes at Kate when she 's seething with anger and fear [*T*-1] , but we know from the outset that he 's not a member of the evil patriarchy .

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: Wall Street is seething over the rules , which [*T*-1] would curtail the tax deductibility of debt used [*] in most LBOs .
example.arg: the rules , which [*T*-1] would curtail the tax deductibility of debt used [*] in most LBOs
